001package com.github.sormuras.bach.customizable;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Command;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.Project;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JavacCommand;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.ProjectSpace;
008import java.nio.file.Path;
009
010/** Compiles and archives Java source files. */
011public class CompileWorkflow extends Workflow {
012
013  protected final ProjectSpace space;
014
015  public CompileWorkflow(Bach bach, Project project, ProjectSpace space) {
016    super(bach, project);
017    this.space = space;
018  }
019
020  protected JavacCommand computeJavacCommand(Path classes) {
021    var computedModuleSourcePath = ModuleSourcePathComputer.compute(space);
022    return Command.javac()
023        .modules(space.modules().names())
024        .option(computedModuleSourcePath.patterns())
025        .option(computedModuleSourcePath.specifics())
026        .outputDirectoryForClasses(classes);
027  }
028
029  protected Path computeOutputDirectoryForClasses() {
030    return bach.path().workspace(space.name(), "classes", "" + computeRelease());
031  }
032
033  protected Path computeOutputDirectoryForModules() {
034    return bach.path().workspace(space.name(), "modules");
035  }
036
037  protected int computeRelease() {
038    return /*space.release().map(JavaRelease::feature).orElse*/ Runtime.version().feature();
039  }
040
041  @Override
042  public void run() {
043    if (space.modules().values().isEmpty()) {
044      bach.logMessage("No %s module present".formatted(space.name()));
045      return;
046    }
047    var size = space.modules().values().size();
048    bach.logCaption("Compile %d %s module%s".formatted(size, space.name(), size == 1 ? "" : "s"));
049
050    var classes = computeOutputDirectoryForClasses();
051    bach.run(computeJavacCommand(classes));
052  }
053}
